content: Actual results could differ materially from those described in the forward-looking statements due to a variety of factors, including the risks and uncertainties detailed in the company’s most recently filed Forms 10-Q and 10-K. We were able to grow daily average comparable store sales by 4.3%, gross margin by 50 basis points and diluted earnings per share by 33.3%. Our full year guidance includes the following: open 4 to 5 new stores, relocate or remodel 2 stores, achieve daily average comparable store sales growth between 1% and 3%, achieve diluted earnings per share between $0.85 and $0.96 and direct $28 million to $35 million towards capital expenditures to support our growth initiatives.
